organization.address: Unit 142, 23 King St, Cambridge, CB1 1AH, United Kingdom

translations.name: Mongolian King James Version
translations.description: Since March 2009 the team has been working full-time on translating the King James Bible into the Mongolian language. As of March 2013 the New Testament has been completed. As soon as a final read through is completed the New Testament will be printed. This version calls God 'Shüteen' object of worship, also used in Mongolian for 'pop idol'.

translations.name: шинэ гэрээ монгол

translations.name: Middle East Media
translations.description_short: Middle East Media uses creative media to introduce the people of the Middle East to the truth of God's love.
